sentence.Network_en: Various oil - producing plants had been grown in Egypt long before Ptolemaic times.
sentence.Network_cn: 在托勒密王朝统治埃及之前,埃及曾种植各种油料作物.

sentence.Network_en: This ptolemaic temple was built to honor two gods.
sentence.Network_cn: 这座托勒密神庙的建造是为了纪念两个神。

sentence.Network_en: Ptolemaic Egypt was a great trading nation.
sentence.Network_cn: 托勒密统治下的埃及贸易业非常发达.
